page.title: 09Carnival and fete.
page.content: I think that the most enjoyable social event held in the village is the Carnival and Fete. Last Saturday we held the 1985 Carnival. Six weeks ago Sarah James was chosen as the Carnival Queen and I was chosen as one of her attendants. By 1.00.pm. on Saturday the village was alive with excitment. Stalls and booths had been set up on the wide verges along Pant Hirwaun and people were gathering, many dressed to join in the Carnival Parade. At 1.05.pm. Mr. George announced the commencement of the Carnival,The Jazz Band struck up a lively tune and the Parade set off through the village. People cheered as we passed through the streets. We returned to enjoy the judging,sports,games etc. It was a wonderful day and a large sum was collected for charity. (Group D.)J.O.
